meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the use of light in combination with a photosensitizing agent to treat diseases such as cancer.
meanings.sent1: The photodynamic treatment helped in fighting cancer cells effectively.
meanings.sent2: Doctors used a photodynamic approach to target the tumor with light therapy.
meanings.sent3: The photodynamic process made the cancer cells glow like tiny stars.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as photodynamic as the sun, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The photodynamic method illuminated a new path in cancer treatment.

meanings.definition: A substance that becomes active when exposed to light, especially in the context of photodynamic therapy.
meanings.sent1: The doctor administered the photodynamic to activate the treatment.
meanings.sent2: The photodynamic reacted swiftly to the light, initiating the therapy process.
meanings.sent3: The photodynamic seemed to dance under the bright lights of the clinic.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a photodynamic, sparking inspiration in the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The photodynamic substance glowed like a hidden gem under the light.
